attribute.description: Mode of the Slider Widget. There are three modes available : badge, edit and basic. In basic mode, only the slider and the label(if present) will be shown and the slider value will be hidden. In badge mode, the default, the slider value will be shown in a badge. In edit mode, an editable input field showing the slider value will be shown; in this mode you can change the value by sliding or editing the value in the field.

attribute.description: Determines whether the slider handles move horizontally (min on left, max on right) or vertically (min on bottom, max on top). If vertical-bottom is specified, the slider is rendered on top, then the value and the Label on the bottom.

attribute.name: binding

attribute.description: Unique identifier of the component in a namingContainer.
attribute.name: id

attribute.description: Boolean value to specify the rendering of the component, when set to false the component will not be rendered.

attribute.description: The text of the tooltip.
attribute.name: tooltip

attribute.description: Where is the tooltip div generated? That's primarily a technical value that can be used to fix rendering errors in special cases. Also see data-container in the documentation of Bootstrap. The default value is body.
attribute.name: tooltip-container

attribute.description: Where is the tooltip div generated? That's primarily a technical value that can be used to fix rendering errors in special cases. Also see data-container in the documentation of Bootstrap. The default value is body.
attribute.name: tooltipContainer

attribute.description: The tooltip is shown and hidden with a delay. This value is the delay in milliseconds. Defaults to 0 (no delay).
attribute.name: tooltip-delay

attribute.description: The tooltip is shown and hidden with a delay. This value is the delay in milliseconds. Defaults to 0 (no delay).
attribute.name: tooltipDelay

attribute.description: The tooltip is hidden with a delay. This value is the delay in milliseconds. Defaults to 0 (no delay).
attribute.name: tooltip-delay-hide

attribute.description: The tooltip is hidden with a delay. This value is the delay in milliseconds. Defaults to 0 (no delay).
attribute.name: tooltipDelayHide

attribute.description: The tooltip is shown with a delay. This value is the delay in milliseconds. Defaults to 0 (no delay).
attribute.name: tooltip-delay-show

attribute.description: The tooltip is shown with a delay. This value is the delay in milliseconds. Defaults to 0 (no delay).
attribute.name: tooltipDelayShow

attribute.description: Where is the tooltip to be displayed? Possible values: "top", "bottom", "right", "left", "auto", "auto top", "auto bottom", "auto right" and "auto left". Default to "bottom".
attribute.name: tooltip-position

attribute.description: Where is the tooltip to be displayed? Possible values: "top", "bottom", "right", "left", "auto", "auto top", "auto bottom", "auto right" and "auto left". Default to "bottom".
attribute.name: tooltipPosition
